actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act to provide for trial of unfair labor practices in the U.S. district court.

summary.text: Substitutes, under the National Labor Relations Act, trials before U.S. District Courts for hearings before trial examiners in cases of unfair labor practices. Directs that such trials be conducted by the court without a jury.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act to provide for trial of unfair labor practices in the U.S. district court.
